++ Good Interfaces

GI is a methodology for creating good UserInterfaces according to TheDevelopmentModusOperandi.

++Principles

    * Only good messages should be allowed in the system. This can be aided by TheDevelopmentModusVivendi
    * Certain phrases, long and complicated words will be prohibited. A [Dictionary] look-up could detect this.
    * Only tell the user what they need to know but make it easy to find more. RelevantInterface, [Errors] have ProblemTypes to ensure relevancy
